custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app messaging is targeted for an app crash
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an in-app message that was setup in Adobe Mobile Services and the user is able to dismiss the message

custom_steps_separated.content: When a certain version of iOS is targeted in Adobe Mobile Services with a message to Rate My App
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the message on that iOS version

custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app message is targeted for a specific iOS version
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive the message on that version of iOS only

custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app message is targeted for a specific time frame
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive the message on that specific schedule

custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app message is targeted for a specific target as Always
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an in-app message every time the trigger occurs

custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app message is targeted for a specific target as Once
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an in-app message only the first time the trigger occurrs

custom_steps_separated.content: When an in-app message is targeted for a specific target as Until-Click through
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an in-app message every time the trigger occurs until the user clicks through

title: In-app Review after video
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am a user in the MLB App
AND Notifications are turned on for the MLB app
AND the 'In-app Review After video' IAM is configured and active on OneSignal
AND the IAM has not already displayed since the app was freshly installed
custom_steps: WHEN I watch a video on demand (A video that is not a live game. Could be video on the team page or Scores page video playlist, etc.)
custom_expected:
THEN after the (1) video completes then I will see an in app message to rate the app
AND the message will not display again unless the app data is cleared (ex. reinstall)
